name: Funy
description:
Funy is a funny little top down infinite arena shooter where your weapon never stays the same!

In its current stage, enemy spawns are random and unchanging and weapons are fully randomized and change every 10 points, but there are plans to create different modes, including one where the difficulty ramps up with harder, faster, and boss enemies, and one where every weapon comes in the form of a pickup that spawns occasionally.

The game is unfinished! Expect glitches. It would be a great help if you could point out these glitches in the comments, too! Especially if they're weird.

Credits:

Font - https://www.1001fonts.com/users/dibujado/

Sound Effects - https://www.leshylabs.com/apps/sfMaker/

Pixelation filter - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/fullscreen-camera-effects/pixe...

Music made by me using Bosca Ceoil, Models also made by me using Blender. Everything else is me as well.
